general_advisory: According to the weather forecast, the district is likely to experience dry weather with clear skies for the next five days. The maximum temperature will range between 24-25°C and the minimum temperature will range between 15.0-17.0°C. The humidity levels will vary between 70-86% (max) and 31-36% (min).

advisory: As the weather is expected to remain clear, harvesting of matured rice can be done. Sundry for 2-3 days to reduce the moisture content to 14%.

To manage whitefly infestation, spray Neem-based pesticide 1500 PPM @ 600-ml/acre by mixing in 200-litre of water. For severe infestation, use Thiamethoxam @ 40-gram/acre or Acetamiprid @ 50-gram/acre by mixing in 200-litre of water.
Spotted pod borer observed in some places in Arhar, to control use bird perches @50/hectare. Use Azadirachtin 0.03% WSP or NSKE 5% or neem oil 2%.

Animals should be given a mineral mixture along with salt regularly. Provide wheat grains, jaggery, etc. @ 10%-20% in the daily ration during the winter season to meet the energy requirement of the animals.
Keep the shed warm as night temperature is decreasing. Provide a bulb to heat the room.
